Package waffleoRai_Utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinTree<T>
    A template class for a simple binary tree structure.
    BinTree.BinNodeInfo<Ty>  
    BitStreamer
    A sleaker way to stream bits from a byte buffer (FileBuffer object).
    CompositeBuffer
    A FileBuffer subclass that is composed of a set of sequential references to other file buffers.
    FileBuffer
    Memory buffer internally implemented as a byte array to hold raw file data.
    Huffman
    Huffman encoding structure.
    HuffTable
    Huffman encoding frequency table.
    ROSubFileBuffer
    For creating a new file buffer from a piece of an existing one, so that copying to a new array is not required.
    Statistics
    Method collection for simple statistics calculations.
    StreamBuffer
    For files larger than should be held in memory.
    SystemUtils
    A static method collection to simplify certain system operations.
    TallyMap  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SystemUtils.OperatingSystem  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileBuffer.BufferReferenceException
    Exception thrown when attempting to write to a part of the buffer that's being referenced by another read-only child buffer in a way that would alter the child buffer's usage.
    FileBuffer.ByteOrderException
    Minimal RuntimeException child class for marking errors with Byte Ordering in file parsing and serialization.
    FileBuffer.UnsupportedFileTypeException
    An exception to throw for parsing, conversion, and serialization errors.
    Huffman.IncompatibleTableException  
    OversizeFileException
    Exception class for throwing when a file cannot be loaded or accessed due to its size.
